name: Slime Patrol
description:
Fight your way against 5 levels of slimes in this action packed game. Make your way to the wormhole at the end of each level, but to get through any of these portals you must sacrifice one crucial component of your ship.

WASD - Move
Mosue1 - Fire Lasers
Mosue2 - Fire Missiles
Space - Warp

R- Restart
Escape - Quit Game

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare Game Jam. Any bugs are because I was rushed and tired. Sorry.
